title: baiters/advance_fee/sources/scamorama/malcolm_reynolds_justice.html
notes:
Another Lad tries to crash the party - though he doesn't seem to be part of the scam. 
I've never done business in Togo, so I have no idea what he's on about. However, he's still a viable target.


Dr. Eminko Banabas


08 December 2006
Dear Mr,Malcolm Reynolds.
I am writing you in related to your western union control number which was withheld by a "STOP ORDER" by Security forces due to acclaimed irregularities of origin of the money being transferred to you by your client/friend in the Union Togolaise de Banque branch of western union, of which I am the Controller /Manager. 
I have offered to help you, if only you agree to my terms.
Firstly, I will not and never tolerate a third person hearing of this, it should be strictly between me and you, because I will not be led into losing my job and pride just trying to help you.
Since the Court order, obtained by the Security force men, stopping the sending of the money, I will assist you by helping you get two of the MTCN numbers, which we can do thus: 
On assisting you, for every 10,000 dollars as was sent to you, I get1,000 dollars from it, (i.e. for the 150,000 dollars, which is the number of "SEND MONEY FORMS" your partner sent, I will get the clerk to retrieve, I get 15,000 dollars). If you agree, then we can continue, if not do not even bother to reply.
I have arranged with the court clerk, where the "STOP-ORDER" suit was filed, so we have to appeal as has always been the case, then on sitting (since it will be an expedited sitting-the next day), then the court clerk who has the send money forms presented to the court as exhibits, will 
help us in taking ALL OF IT from the "EVIDENCE ROOM", where it is being kept by the security men as "EVIDENCE" against your partner and the "WESTERN UNION MANAGEMENT" and replacing it with a " SUPPOSED FAKE" one (reduplication),so as I collect it from the court clerk, through the evidence room window, I will send them to you, for you to collect the money over there in your country and send me my share, and the forms to you and immediately the funds is released to you in your place. 
All we have to do now is to file for an appeal, which will cost  about 250 dollars, so we can collect the MTCN Send Money Forms used in sending the money to you. You will have to send the money for the Appeal case-(250 dollars)-DON'YT ASK ME TO PAY, BECAUSE I DON'T HAVE IT.I AM ONLY HELPING YOU.SO END IT TO THIS NAME PEACE DOGBEY AND CALL ME +233275128085
Send me your phone number, so immediately I get the MTCN numbers, I call you and give it to you, my office phone is connected to the INTERCOM, of MINISTRY of Finance, so I only call you, if I receive call with it the intercom operator will known that  I am helping you with this claim.
For your information, do not ever send the money by western union or money gram to Togo, as it will be traced to me by Security forces, better off, you can send to Ghana; aflao-lome border branch of western union, so I can send someone across the border to receive it, not to be traced by the 
Security forces.
Thank you.
Dr Eminko banabas Controller/Manager
Western Union Money Transfer, Union Togolaise De Banque (UTB), Lome-Togo


I can use this...

messages.body:
Bring on our first contestant! 
My first thought on seeing this was that I'd been drawn into someone else's bait... and that we have a Lad who never heard of the concept of a full stop.





30 November 2006
Dear Sir
My name is Emmanuel Justice  who just called you right away I am From Freetown Republic of Sierra-Leone, I just came into Ghana to claim my Late Father consignments with my mother which he deposited in OBEST SECURITY COMPANY here in Accra Ghana, I and my mother have Claim the two consignments trunk boxes from the security company, They are now with us in the Bishop house who gives us support during the claim of the funds from the security company. He was also the person who gives us your contact....whose name is Bishop Evans Obaron......and you can also reach him through his email address on bishop_evans_obaron@yahoo.co.uk Tell phone 00233285058636, I and my mother is contacting you to be our foreign beneficiary who will receive the consignments there in your country, So that we can come over to set up an investment with  your country, each of this consignments contain $23 million us dollar and Gold and Diamond worth 75 kilogram per each consignments, The only problem we are facing now is how we can open one of these  consignments trunks boxes so that we can have money to pay the diplomat who will come down to your country for delivering of the consignments to you in your doorstep the other one consignment trunk box, I and my mother went to meet the Rev Father at the church and explain things to him and he directed us to a company where we can get the diamond cutter to rent to open one of these consignments trunk boxes
All I need from you now is your home address and the name of your country include with your fax number and with your telephone number so that as soon as I rent the diamond cutter, I can open one of the consignment to get money from it and look for a diplomat who will deliver the other one consignment to you in your country with your information which I requested, And I will also need your account information to transfer the rest money with me from the open consignment to you in your country. And all the document covering the two consignments are with me including the claim receipt, if you need them I can send them to you for your proper scrutiny, And as soon as you get back to me we will discuss the percentage we will offer you, Hope to hear from you
Yours Sincerely
Emmanuel Justice & My Mother
00233-243-083-039


I'd heard of these Box Cutter scams, but never expected to receive one.

messages.body:
Mr Justice,
What is this about? I haven't had a call from you. Please explain.
Regards,
Malcolm Reynolds
messages.raw:
Malcolm Reynolds

Mr Justice,
What is this about? I haven't had a call from you. Please explain.
Regards,
Malcolm Reynolds

messages.body:
30 November 2006
"Dear Malcolm Reynolds 
Regarding our phone conversation I have gone fore the negotiation of the diamond cutter and the amount it will cost me to get it for renting, I thank you very much for your kindly mail which you sent across to me, and it sound very great to me and I know that you are the type which I can entrust my funds upon without having any problem, So I decided to attach my passport and the whole necessary documents related to the deposited of the consignments and the shipment as well to you, So after reading your mail before I decided to get back to you I went with the Rev father who gave me your contact which is Rev Bishop Evans Obaron to obest Security Company whose email:obest_s_c1970@yahoo.com telephone number is +233-243-634-600 his is Major Ibrahim Oliya,the sole proprietor of the company Where we claim the consignments to negotiate on how the consignments can be deliver to you there in your doorstep, so the security company managing director Major Ibrahim Oliya then told us that to deliver the consignments to you in your country will cost us the sum of $25,000,00 twenty five us dollars, Because according to him he said that they are going to use the cargo plane to convey the consignments to you in your country, But been that we did not know your pocket if really that you can afford that amount of money to pay immediately they arrive with the consignments trunk boxes, we decided to negotiate on How much the diamond cuter will cost us to get the two trunk boxes consignments opened? because in my previous mail I told you that in spite of the war in my country which led to the death of my father make us to lost nearly all that we have and we manage to escape from sierra Leone to Ghana after the war so this led to the situation where we misplace the keys to the trunk boxes, so this is the main reason why we need the diamond cutter which can open the consignments trunk boxes, because the consignments is a diamond save trunk boxes, they told us that to get the diamond cutter to rent will cost the sum of $1500 us dollars, and the Rev told me to mail you and explain to you so that you should send the money today to this name Fredrick Eddygbene, so that by tomorrow we can go and get the diamond cutter and open the consignments trunk boxes so that we can wire the money via the bank to you in your designate bank account
So please I also want to use this opportunity to inform you that you should never disappoint me, because this is my life and my hope the only thing left for me here on earth that I have to make do with and after the opening I am going to entrust it to you by wiring it to you through your account, And I am going to entrust it in your hands, because after I open this consignments trunk boxes I will have to push the money to your account, with the help of the Ghana Chartered Stansdard bank manager who is a good friend to Rev Bishop Evans obaron, And all this arrangement on how the money can be transfer into your designated account after I open my consignments trunk boxes has been made this morning when we went to the bank to enquire from the bank manager on how this transfer can be made successful to you after the opening of the consignments trunk boxes, So he make it very clear to us, that the $46000,000,00 forty six millions us dollars can be transfer to your designate bank account which you shall provide the relevant detail as you are sending me the money for the diamond cutter detail, beat by beat like $5,000,000,00 five millions us dollars per each transfer, And immediately this money materialize in your account you will have to send me and my mother invitation letter for we to come down to you in your country to set up and investment with your help, so I want you to send the $1500us dollars to me on this name Fredrick Eddygbene, and send me the information through mail which is the control number and the sender name immediately you send the money, and call me okay
I hope to hear from you today 
Emmanuel Justice 
+233243-083-039 


"Regarding our phone conversation..." He has seriously lost the plot. He also forgot to attach his passport and the "whole necessary documents"; and his mother has been written out.
Note the name "Freddy Eddygbene" (mentioned twice). You'll be seeing it a lot.

messages.body:
Mr Justice,
What are you talking about? 
What phone conversation? I've never spoken to you. 
I don't know who you are and I don't see your passport or documents of any kind.
Malcolm Reynolds



Let's see if either of the other addresses will get any reaction.
messages.raw:
Malcolm Reynolds

Mr Justice,
What are you talking about?
What phone conversation? I've never spoken to you.

I don't know who you are and I don't see your passport or documents of any kind. Malcolm Reynolds

Let's see if either of the other addresses will get any reaction.

messages.body:
Bishop Evans Obaron:
I was contacted by one Emmanuel Justice, who informed me that you were the person who suggested that he contact me.  
I would like to know why you did this.
Regards,
Malcolm Reynolds
messages.raw:
Malcolm Reynolds

Bishop Evans Obaron:
I was contacted by one Emmanuel Justice, who informed me that you were the person who suggested that he contact me.
I would like to know why you did this.
Regards,
Malcolm Reynolds

messages.body:
Atten: Major Ibrahim Oliya
Sir,
I am led to believe that Mr Emmanuel Justice and Bishop Evans Obaron may have mentioned my name in dealings with you.
Please be informed that these dealings were undertaken without my knowledge or approval.
I will inform you if there is any further action.
Regards,
Malcolm Reynolds
PS Are you a serving military officer? As a former Captain in the United States Marine Corps, I would be interested to know this.
messages.raw:
Malcolm Reynolds

Atten: Major Ibrahim Oliya
Sir,
I am led to believe that Mr Emmanuel Justice and Bishop Evans Obaron may have mentioned my name in dealings with you.
Please be informed that these dealings were undertaken without my knowledge or approval.
I will inform you if there is any further action.
Regards,
Malcolm Reynolds
PS Are you a serving military officer? As a former Captain in the United States Marine Corps, I would be interested to know this.

messages.body:
As it happens, no.






01 December 2006
Dear Sir.
How is the family and business? Hope all is doing well
I received your mail,and the content of your mail is well noted to me,I told you in my previous mail that I sent you all the necessary documents regarding this transaction which include my passport, But I was a beat surprise when you told me that you did not received it,Please check your mail very well,and if you could find it,then kindly get in touch to me,and I promise to send it to you again, In the other hand I have to inform you that I am seeking your help,so I want you to give me the best of the assistant which I needed from you,so that I can make things faster here and then have the funds transfer to you in your country
regard
Emmanuel
messages.raw:
As it happens, no.

Emmanuel Justice

regard
Emmanuel

messages.body:
Mr Justice,
Despite your claims, you've sent me nothing, while you claim to have spoken to me, which you haven't. I have gone through my emails, and found nothing from you.
Send me that documentation and we could start from a position of mutual understanding. Otherwise, there's nothing to say.
Malcolm Reynolds
messages.raw:
Malcolm Reynolds

Mr Justice,
Despite your claims, you've sent me nothing, while you claim to have spoken to me, which you haven't. I have gone through my emails, and found nothing from you.
Send me that documentation and we could start from a position of mutual understanding. Otherwise, there's nothing to say.
Malcolm Reynolds

messages.body:
He sends a raft of documents, all comically bad. Why does he insist we spoke on the phone?






04 December 2006
Dear Sir.
How is the family and business? Hope all is fine. I received your mail,and the content of your mail is well noted to me,Well I am very surprise to hear from you that you did not receive the documents,and you also said you hard not have phone conversation with me before,this is really surprise,any way send me your phone num,ber again,below is the documents again,
Go through and get back to me so that we can proceed on this transaction without any further delay,
Regard
Emmanuel Justice

He sends a raft of documents, all comically bad. Why does he insist we spoke on the phone?

Emmanuel Justice

04 December 2006
Dear Sir
. How is the family and business? Hope all is fine. I received your mail,and the content of your mail is well noted to me,Well I am very surprise to hear from you that you did not receive the documents,and you also said you hard not have phone conversation with me before,this is really surprise,any way send me your phone num,ber again,below is the documents again, Go through and get back to me so that we can proceed on this transaction without any further delay, Regard
Emmanuel Justice

messages.body:
06 December 2006
Dear Dad.
How is the family and business? Hope all is fine.
Dad why is it that I did not hear from you, I really want you to try much as you could to go through my mail, and consider my situation and get back to me, because as I am here now I am suffering.
And I need your help on how I can get out of this suffering. so I want you to understand me and know better than I know, and send the money to me with this name Fredrick Eddygbene so that I can go and get the diamond cutter to rent
Immediately I open my consignments trunk boxes I will immediately travel down to Lome Togo where I shall send you money which you will use to come to Ghana to help transfer this funds from Ghana to your designated account
So kindly send me the needed funds to get the diamond cutter and send this money today.
Regard
Emmanuel Justice


Mentions of Freddy Eddygbene - 3
messages.raw:
Emmanuel Justice

06 December 2006
Dear Dad.
How is the family and business? Hope all is fine.
Dad why is it that I did not hear from you, I really want you to try much as you could to go through my mail, and consider my situation and get back to me, because as I am here now I am suffering. And I need your help on how I can get out of this suffering. so I want you to understand me and know better than I know, and send the money to me with this name Fredrick Eddygbene so that I can go and get the diamond cutter to rent
Immediately I open my consignments trunk boxes I will immediately travel down to Lome Togo where I shall send you money which you will use to come to Ghana to help transfer this funds from Ghana to your designated account
So kindly send me the needed funds to get the diamond cutter and send this money today.
Regard
Emmanuel Justice

Mentions of Freddy Eddygbene - 3

messages.body:
Mr Justice,
Dad? I sure as hell ain't your gorram Dad! I never got up to that sort of stuff when I was twelve - fourteen, yeah, but not twelve!
Now, tell me straight - just who the hell is Freddy Eddygbene and exactly why is he getting money for you? 
The other thing is - what in tarnation are you planning here? I send you money so you can travel to another country to send me money so that I can travel to shift money - WTF?
Wouldn't it be easier if I brought the money needed - and maybe the expertise required to open this gorram box?
Malcolm Reynolds
messages.raw:
Malcolm Reynolds

Mr Justice,
Dad? I sure as hell ain't your gorram Dad! I never got up to that sort of stuff when I was twelve - fourteen, yeah, but not twelve!
Now, tell me straight - just who the hell is Freddy Eddygbene and exactly why is he getting money for you?
The other thing is - what in tarnation are you planning here? I send you money so you can travel to another country to send me money so that I can travel to shift money - WTF?
Wouldn't it be easier if I brought the money needed - and maybe the expertise required to open this gorram box?
Malcolm Reynolds

messages.body:
07 December 2006
Dear Sir.
Thank you very much fore your kindly mail,which you sent to me,actually I have gone through your mail,and I have to inform you that.FREDRICK EDDYGBENE is the secretary to the security company where I went to get the Dimaond cutter,although I don't them that I don't have money that it is somebody who is going to help me,to pay this money and I told them that the person is now in Accra Ghana that is in oversea
So they told me that for you to sure and understand all that I am telling is that you should personally send the money accross to the name of there secretary that is why I come to accross that name.so all taht you need to do is that you should send the money to this name FREDRICK EDDYGBENE.and send me the control number so that we can proceed at once.
in the other hand I am going to travel from Ghana to Lome Togo where I shall go to send you money because here in Accra Ghana you can not send money out,because they only received,But I will have to travel fours drive to make sure I send you money which will enable you arrange your coming to Ghana to help me transfer the funds out of Ghana to your designated account,after that you will prepare my visa and then I will go with you to your country without any further delay
please explain this world fore me WTP
Regard
Emmanuel Justice


We've had comical Lad geography before - but placing Ghana overseas from Cote d'Ivoire?
Mentions of Freddy Eddygbene - 5

please explain this world fore me WTP

messages.body:
Mr Justice,
I should gorram well hope that you read my last email! 
I am still confused by your message. Did you tell that Freddy guy that I'm in Accra Ghana? Or that I'm overseas? It can't be both!
As I said before, I don't need you to send me money to come to Togo (or Ghana). 
But most of all, I want you to describe this gorram box, and exactly why you need this gorram special cutter. 
Malcolm Reynolds

Malcolm Reynolds

Mr Justice,
I should gorram well hope that you read my last email!
I am still confused by your message. Did you tell that Freddy guy that I'm in Accra Ghana? Or that I'm overseas? It can't be both!
As I said before, I don't need you to send me money to come to Togo (or Ghana).
But most of all, I want you to describe this gorram box, and exactly why you need this gorram special cutter.
Malcolm Reynolds

Dear Sir.
How is the family and business? Hope all is fine, I received your e-mail I was also very surprise that you did not send me the $1500 dollars which will enable me go and get the diamond cutter
Please I want you to try much as you could to send the money and send it to this name FREDRICK EDDYGBENE,and send me the control number via the mail so that I can get everything done and start transferring the funds to you
Regard
Emmanuel Justice

messages.body:
Mr Justice,
I haven't sent the money because I still don't understand how this all happened. 
Who packed the money, gold and diamonds in the box? How was it sealed? How come the key wasn't delivered to you? And why do you think I need the money to come to Ghana? 
Look, answer my gorram questions or it's no deal!
Malcolm Reynolds
messages.raw:
Malcolm Reynolds

Mr Justice,
I haven't sent the money because I still don't understand how this all happened.
Who packed the money, gold and diamonds in the box? How was it sealed? How come the key wasn't delivered to you? And why do you think I need the money to come to Ghana?
Look, answer my gorram questions or it's no deal!
Malcolm Reynolds

messages.body:
08 December 2006
Dear Sir.
My late father was the one who sealed this money in the metalic diamond save boxes,and he did it because of security reasons then
The reason why we need the daimond cutter is that because of the war which led to the death of my late father that is why we lost the key and not only the key but we also lost nearly every body in the family then, So we are beging you to pleaser understand that we are not happy in this kind of situation which we are now,so I really want you to do me this favor to send this $1500 dollars SEND IT TO ME WITH THIS NAME FREDRICK EDDYGBENE,so that I can go and get the diamond cutter immediuately
The reason why I told you that I am going to send you money is that as soon as I get the consignmets trunk boxes open i will need your help to enable you come to Ghana to help me transfer this funds into your designated account,so that we can fetch me along with yourseif to your country so that we can go and invest with the funds.there in your country
Regard
Emmanuel Justice


Mentions of Freddy Eddygbene - 7
messages.raw:
Emmanuel Justice

08 December 2006
Dear Sir.
My late father was the one who sealed this money in the metalic diamond save boxes,and he did it because of security reasons then

Mr Justice,
Something just struck me - why do you want a diamond cutter? The gorram box isn't made of diamonds! It's made of steel, right? Therefore you need a steel cutting device!
Look, forget about the cutter. Give me your location so that I can work out how to get there with my old Corps buddy Jayne Cobb. If anyone could open it, that man is Jayne. 
It's that simple, man! Just do it!
Malcolm Reynolds

messages.body:
On the other hand, I don't really need this Lad too, so I slap him down.






Dr Bananas,
Threaten all you like, but I've just stopped the payment at my local Western Union office and got my money back. Obviously you may be God in your own little acre, but that's all you are. There'll be no gorram appeal, and your penny-ante Security Forces can go jump in the lake.
Now give me one good reason why I shouldn't report you to Western Union head office and get you fired so high that your gorram feet won't ever touch the ground again!
Malcolm Reynolds

messages.body:
Mr Justice,
If you'd well noted the contents of my last email you'd know that I can't send the money! I tried to (against my better judgement), but I got a message from Western Union that the transfer's been frozen by the Security Forces. I don't want to risk getting you into trouble by giving too much away, as this guy said that everything should be kept confidential. Here are the relevant bits.
I am writing you in related to your western union control number which was withheld by a "STOP ORDER" by Security forces due to acclaimed irregularities of origin of the money being transferred to you.  
I will not and never tolerate a third person hearing of this, it should be strictly between me and you, because I will not be led into losing my job and pride just trying to help you.
Since the Court order, obtained by the Security force men, stopping the sending of the money, I will assist you by helping you get the MTCN number.
So now I have no idea how to handle this. 
The local Western Union office said they'd look into it, but I'm none too sanguine about them doing much about it.
Malcolm Reynolds

Malcolm Reynolds

messages.body:
Mr Justice, 
Assuming that I can send the money - that manager might still mess things up - the reasoning is this; you have the boxes full of money and gold and diamonds that you can't open. I supply the money to get the box cutter. You open the boxes and lo and behold, the money and gold and diamonds are yours. You make off with them, and I never hear from you again. I have no way of knowing that you'll keep your end of the deal. You see my point, don't you?
It's so much easier if we came to where you were and either opened the boxes ourselves (Jayne is good at that sort of thing) or helped purchase the box cutter; that way it's all done out in the open and everyone wins. I see my share safely stowed away and then the money transfer proper can begin while I write and send your introduction letter. 
If this ain't acceptable, tell me the hell why!
Malcolm Reynolds

messages.body:
Mr Justice,
You know why you haven't had a call from me? Because none of the numbers that you provided me actually work. Every time I get dead air. I don't know if the problem is at your end or mine, but if you want to try, here it is; (03) 9347 8666.
For the last time - I am not sending you any money. 
I am going to come over there with my Marine Corps buddy Jayne Cobb and see to this matter personally. I want you to send me details of your location and the nearest airport that can take private air traffic.
I am not frightened. I am determined. This is how I intend to resolve this matter, and you can take it or leave it.
Malcolm Reynolds

messages.body:
I'm trying for a trophy now.





 
Mr Justice,
We've been through this before - and since I've given up on going to Ghana (visas are a bitch at the best of times), I'm going to have to press this point again; if I send the money, what's to stop you from opening the boxes and leaving me high and dry?
There's one possibility - write me a letter of agreement or some such, in your own handwriting, stating that you promise to give me 20% of the value of the contents of the boxes you lodged with Obest (quoting the date and serial number). Write it in black ink so the sucker will scan clearly! Get that notarized before a JP or whatever, then scan it and send it to me. Then I'll send the money. Are we clear?
Malcolm Reynolds
